name: Learn Chinese - Phrases and Words, Speak Chinese
description: Learn Chinese language: alphabet, words, phrases, pinyin & conversation is a huge Chinese dictionary for people who want to learn Chinese.  It consists lectures of chinese writing, grammar, vocabulary, speaking mandarin Chinese for you to increase your level every day. If you are learning Chinese, trying to improve your Chinese, this application is the best application for you.  Main features:  Over 2000 most popular Chinese conversation  Useful knowledge of Chinese Pinyin and pronunciation  Listen Chinese Pinyin from input words or letters   Learn Chinese characters  Learn how to write in Chinese  Learn how to speak Chinese  Learn Chinese by songs  Learn Chinese by tutoring videos  Collection of Chinese grammar lessons from easy to hard  Famous Chinese idioms with interesting stories  Provide useful knowledge about the history and culture of China, including Chinese poems, world heritage sites in China, Chinese arts, Chinese food, Chinese slang, Chinese tongue-twister for those who want to travel to China  Save your favourite lessons and chinese conversation into a list for future reference With this wonderful app you can study Chinese in the fastest and most effective way!
